title.rendered: Sweatband Set Sports Headband Wristband Set Terry Cloth Wristband Athletic Exercise

content.rendered:
Sport Yoga
Brand FACATH
Band width 8 Centimetres
Band material type Cotton,Spandex,Nylon

About this item

  • Package includes 3 Pieces: 1 pieces green white green headband, 2 pieces green white green wristbands, they are fashion popular sweatbands set.
  • Comfort Material & Size: Elastic comfortable sweat bands made of 80% unique blend of cotton, 12% spandex and 8% nylon, Headband size: approx.7.9″ x 2.2″, wristbands size: approx. 3.14″ x 3 14″. The sweatband headbands wristbands which keep sweat out of your head and wrist, give you a comfortable sporting feeling.
  • Non-slip & Easy to Wash: These headbands and wristbands don’t slip and are perfect for men workouts, women sports, and athletics for children. Head/wrist Bands with High level sweat absorbing materials, which that absorbs sweat and protect your skin, soft lightweight and durable, easy to wash, not easy to deform and fade. Striped sweatband set color soft, more color for your select.
  • Practical Use: Beautiful sweatbands for your hands and wrists offer maximum absorbency beyond ordinary terry cloths, design in professional style. Perfect for high-intensity workouts, tennis, and basketball to keep you free from distractions from sweaty hands and stinging eyes. used for soccer, tennis, workout, running, walking, yoga, cycling, badminton, baseball, table tennis and any other physical exercise activity.
  • Suitable more occasions: These headband & wristbands suitable for sports like yoga, running, jogging, marathon, ball games, and other exercising sports. Also can be dress for parties, such as dancing, 80’s costume, dress up parties, Halloween costumes, Christmas, This is the perfect 1980s workout set for women, teens & girls. A stylish 80 s costume set that is super comfortable.
